title: Riot wtf is this?
body:

replies.body: It will only count assists AFTER you get the 25000 gold achievement. You see how it's a progression-based thing?

> [{quoted}](name=Elendil,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OoX5W3bs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-25T10:19:16.401+0000)
>
> It will only count assists AFTER you get the 25000 gold achievement. You see how it's a progression-based thing?

That's fucking stupid.
It's smart in a way actually
that's what you get for picking the TF icon.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OoX5W3bs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-25T07:56:34.679+0000)
>
> that's what you get for picking the TF icon.

Rekt me.

I chose TF
(I'm going TF all the way tbh, I didn't like Graves in the narrative, yes I've read both acts)
Maybe u should send a support ticket to riot

OK so first you have to get Gold then second you gotta get assists need anymore help?
P.S.  no point to life so you not gonna call that stupid to...
